message: Let's start fair. I'll take 99% and you get 1% this time.  We can work out something more even later.
That's ridiculous, let's be reasonable. I take 70%, you take 30%.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  We can keep moving towards a more even split in the future.
It's my turn to propose a compromise. 60/40, but with me getting the larger share this time.
